i2cExpansionBoard.initI2C|block: 初始化I2C扩展板[name] I2C地址为[address]
i2cExpansionBoard.setI2CMode|block: I2C扩展板[name] 设置引脚[pin]模式[mode]
i2cExpansionBoard.setI2CSteeringAngle|bl: I2C扩展板[name] 引脚[servoMotorPin]舵机角度设置为[angle]
i2cExpansionBoard.setI2CPinLevel|block: I2C扩展板[name] 引脚[pin]舵机角度设置为[level]
i2cExpansionBoard.setI2CPWMFreq|block: I2C扩展板[name] 设置PWM模式频率(1-10000)为 [freq]
i2cExpansionBoard.setI2CPWMDuty|block: I2C扩展板[name] 引脚[pin]设置PWM模式的占空比为 [duty]
